constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 158 (Tuesday, September 14, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. LEVIN of California:
H.R. 5255.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1 Section 8 of the U.S. Constitution
[Page H4524]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

title: To amend section 7014 of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to advance toward full Federal funding for impact aid, and for other purposes.
